external_games.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Ironskull's Boyz

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Ironskull's Boyz
summary: Iron-clad and muscle-bound, these brutal Orruks are trapped in an endless battle within the shifting city of Shadespire. They wield huge, rusted weapons and thirst for combat. Unlock this warband and play as the Ironskull's Boyz in Warhammer Underworlds: Online.
